reviewText: This is perhaps the most despicable film I have ever seen.  In some perverse way, it seems to equate the murder of an unborn child with the death of a soldier on the battlefield.  If that was the intent, this film is utterly wicked, and its very production would constitute a crime.
Very underrated movie, it was amazing. DOES NOT WORK FOR MOST DVD/Blu-Ray PLAYERS. Use only if you have a PC or console to watch this on.
Just generally a good film which did come up to my expectations, thank you.
